prompt: Write a short email to schedule a meeting with a colleague, proposing 2–3 time options.
Draft a polite follow-up email checking in on a request you sent last week.
Rewrite a paragraph to be clearer and more concise while keeping the original meaning.
Summarize this article in 5 bullet points, capturing the main takeaways and any key numbers.
Create a to-do list for tomorrow based on these notes, grouping items by priority.
Draft a Slack message to update your team on project progress and next steps in 3–5 sentences.
Write a short thank-you note after an interview, referencing one specific part of the conversation.
Turn these rough notes into a structured meeting agenda with time estimates for each item.
Proofread this text for grammar, spelling, and tone, and suggest improvements where needed.
Write a brief LinkedIn post announcing a milestone or launch, keeping it professional and upbeat.
